definition: with little or no preparation or forethought, remark made spontaneously without prior preparation, to perform without preparation
details:
adjective
- with little or no preparation or forethought
= example: with little or no preparation or forethought
= synonyms: impromptu
- said or done without having been planned or written in advance
= example: said or done without having been planned or written in advance
= synonyms: spontaneous, unwritten
noun
- remark made spontaneously without prior preparation
= example: remark made spontaneously without prior preparation
verb
- to perform without preparation
= example: to perform without preparation
= synonyms: improvise, improvize, extemporize, extemporise
